title: If akali was a pokemon...
body:
[](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1e/Akali_OriginalLoading.jpg/revision/20160523232649)
She would be a medicham
http://pa1.narvii.com/5848/0e3fc51988b493bf92741400b9506f5a9a106b6d_hq.gif
A capable hybrid with heavy hits.

replies.body: same thing with ahri [insert lenny face here]
Scyther? Lots of knives and like the color green?
probably a better usage for scyther elsewhere, want to go through every champion without repeating pokemon.
Honestly if we are looking for a powerful hybrid damage fighting type Lucario fits more.
I'm trying to do every champion without repeating pokemon, and I can think of a champion to which lucario might fit better.

Just because Lucian and Lucario are really similar names, doesn't mean it fits.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
